attributes.action: Refuse to grant any form of amnesty to illegal immigrants as proposed by the ‘Strangers to Citizens’ movement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 'Strangers to Citizens' movement proposes to bring pressure on the government to grant an amnesty to those people who show already that the law is something to be ignored in this already overcrowded and crime ridden nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
